text: Amar Singh (27 January 1956 â€“ 1 August 2020) was an Indian politician. He was one of the leaders of the Samajwadi Party. He was a member of the Rajya Sabha from 2016 until his death. On August 1, 2020, at the age of 64, Singh died from kidney failure at a hospital in Singapore. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Uttar Pradesh Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Amar Singh (politician)
